verses.verse: Now these are they that came <S%H935><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> to Ziklag <S%H6860><s%>, while he yet kept himself close <S%H6113><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kish <S%H7027><s%>: and they were among the mighty men <S%H1368><s%>, helpers <S%H5826><s%> of the war <S%H4421><s%>.

They were armed <S%H5401><s%> with bows <S%H7198><s%>, and could use both the right hand <S%H3231><s%> and the left <S%H8041><s%> in hurling stones <S%H68><s%> and shooting arrows <S%H2671><s%> out of a bow <S%H7198><s%>, they were of Saul <S%H7586><s%>'s brothers <S%H251><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>.

The chief <S%H7218><s%> was Ahiezer <S%H295><s%>, then Joash <S%H3101><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shemaah <S%H8094><s%> the Gibeathite <S%H1395><s%>; and Jeziel <S%H3149><s%>, and Pelet <S%H6404><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Azmaveth <S%H5820><s%>; and Berachah <S%H1294><s%>, and Jehu <S%H3058><s%> the Antothite <S%H6069><s%>,

And Ismaiah <S%H3460><s%> the Gibeonite <S%H1393><s%>, a mighty man <S%H1368><s%> among the thirty <S%H7970><s%>, and over the thirty <S%H7970><s%>; and Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>, and Jahaziel <S%H3166><s%>, and Johanan <S%H3110><s%>, and Josabad <S%H3107><s%> the Gederathite <S%H1452><s%>,
Eluzai <S%H498><s%>, and Jerimoth <S%H3406><s%>, and Bealiah <S%H1183><s%>, and Shemariah <S%H8114><s%>, and Shephatiah <S%H8203><s%> the Haruphite <S%H2741><s%>,
Elkanah <S%H511><s%>, and Jesiah <S%H3449><s%>, and Azareel <S%H5832><s%>, and Joezer <S%H3134><s%>, and Jashobeam <S%H3434><s%>, the Korhites <S%H7145><s%>,
And Joelah <S%H3132><s%>, and Zebadiah <S%H2069><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jeroham <S%H3395><s%> of Gedor <S%H1446><s%>.

And of the Gadites <S%H1425><s%> there separated <S%H914><s%> themselves unto David <S%H1732><s%> into the hold <S%H4679><s%> to the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> men <S%H1368><s%> of might <S%H2428><s%>, and men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H6635><s%> fit for the battle <S%H4421><s%>, that could handle <S%H6186><s%> shield <S%H6793><s%> and shield <S%H7420><s%>, whose faces <S%H6440><s%> were like the faces <S%H6440><s%> of lions <S%H738><s%>, and were as swift <S%H4116><s%> as the roes <S%H6643><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%>;
Ezer <S%H5829><s%> the first <S%H7218><s%>, Obadiah <S%H5662><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%>, Eliab <S%H446><s%> the third <S%H7992><s%>,
Mishmannah <S%H4925><s%> the fourth <S%H7243><s%>, Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the fifth <S%H2549><s%>,
Attai <S%H6262><s%> the sixth <S%H8345><s%>, Eliel <S%H447><s%> the seventh <S%H7637><s%>,
Johanan <S%H3110><s%> the eighth <S%H8066><s%>, Elzabad <S%H443><s%> the ninth <S%H8671><s%>,
Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> the tenth <S%H6224><s%>, Machbanai <S%H4344><s%> the eleventh <S%H6249><s%>.

These were of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, captains <S%H7218><s%> of the army <S%H6635><s%>: one <S%H259><s%> of the least <S%H6996><s%> was over a hundred <S%H3967><s%>, and the greatest <S%H1419><s%> over a thousand <S%H505><s%>.

These are they that went over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, when it had overflown <S%H4390><s%> all his banks <S%H1415><s%>; and they put to flight <S%H1272><s%> all them of the valleys <S%H6010><s%>, both toward the east <S%H4217><s%>, and toward the west <S%H4628><s%>.
And there came <S%H935><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> and Judah <S%H3063><s%> to the hold <S%H4679><s%> unto David <S%H1732><s%>.

And David <S%H1732><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> to meet <S%H6440><s%> them <S%H6030><s%>, and answered and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H935><s%>, If you be come peaceably <S%H7965><s%> unto me to help <S%H5826><s%> me <S%H3824><s%>, my heart shall be knit <S%H3162><s%> unto you <S%H7411><s%>: but if you be come to betray me to my enemies <S%H6862><s%>, seeing there is no <S%H3808><s%> wrong <S%H2555><s%> in my hands <S%H3709><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of our fathers <S%H1><s%> look <S%H7200><s%> on it <S%H3198><s%>, and rebuke it.

Then the spirit <S%H7307><s%> came <S%H3847><s%> upon Amasai <S%H6022><s%>, who was chief <S%H7218><s%> of the captains <S%H7970><s%>, and he said <S%H1732><s%>, Yours are we, David, and on your side <S%H1121><s%>, you son of Jesse <S%H3448><s%>: peace <S%H7965><s%>, peace <S%H7965><s%> be unto you <S%H7965><s%>, and peace be to your helpers <S%H5826><s%>; for your God <S%H430><s%> helps <S%H5826><s%> you <S%H1732><s%>. Then David received <S%H6901><s%> them <S%H5414><s%>, and made them captains <S%H7218><s%> of the band <S%H1416><s%>.

And there fell <S%H5307><s%> some of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%>, when he came <S%H935><s%> with the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> against Saul <S%H7586><s%> to battle <S%H4421><s%>: but they helped <S%H5826><s%> them not <S%H5633><s%>: for the lords of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> upon advisement <S%H6098><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> him away <S%H559><s%>, saying, He will fall <S%H5307><s%> to his master <S%H113><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> to the jeopardy of our heads <S%H7218><s%>.

As he went <S%H3212><s%> to Ziklag <S%H6860><s%>, there fell <S%H5307><s%> to him of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, Adnah <S%H5734><s%>, and Jozabad <S%H3107><s%>, and Jediael <S%H3043><s%>, and Michael <S%H4317><s%>, and Jozabad <S%H3107><s%>, and Elihu <S%H453><s%>, and Zilthai <S%H6769><s%>, captains <S%H7218><s%> of the thousands <S%H505><s%> that were of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>.

And they helped <S%H5826><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> against the band <S%H1416><s%> of the rovers <S%H1368><s%>: for they were all mighty men of valor <S%H2428><s%>, and were captains <S%H8269><s%> in the army <S%H6635><s%>.

For at that time <S%H6256><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> by day <S%H3117><s%> there came <S%H935><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> to help <S%H5826><s%> him <S%H1419><s%>, until it was a great army <S%H4264><s%>, like the army <S%H4264><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>.

And these are the numbers <S%H4557><s%> of the bands <S%H7218><s%> that were ready armed <S%H2502><s%> to the war <S%H6635><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> to Hebron <S%H2275><s%>, to turn <S%H5437><s%> the kingdom <S%H4438><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> to him <S%H6310><s%>, according to the word of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> that bore <S%H5375><s%> shield <S%H6793><s%> and spear <S%H7420><s%> were six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>, ready armed <S%H2502><s%> to the war <S%H6635><s%>.
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%>, mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of valor <S%H2428><s%> for the war <S%H6635><s%>, seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and one hundred <S%H3967><s%>.
Of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.
And Jehoiada <S%H3077><s%> was the leader <S%H5057><s%> of the Aaronites <S%H175><s%>, and with him were three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>;

And Zadok <S%H6659><s%>, a young man <S%H5288><s%> mighty <S%H1368><s%> of valor <S%H2428><s%>, and of his father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> captains <S%H8269><s%>.

And of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, the relatives <S%H251><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%>, three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>: for until now the greatest <S%H4768><s%> part of them had kept <S%H8104><s%> the custody <S%H4931><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%>.

And of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>, mighty <S%H1368><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of valor <S%H2428><s%>, famous <S%H8034><s%> throughout the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>.

And of the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> eighteen <S%H8083><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>, which were expressed <S%H5344><s%> by name <S%H8034><s%>, to come <S%H935><s%> and make David <S%H1732><s%> king <S%H4427><s%>.

And of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%>, which were men that had understanding <S%H998><s%> of the times <S%H6256><s%>, to know <S%H3045><s%> what Israel <S%H3478><s%> should do <S%H6213><s%>; the heads <S%H7218><s%> of them were two hundred <S%H3967><s%>; and all their brothers <S%H251><s%> were at their commandment <S%H6310><s%>.

Of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>, such as went forth <S%H3318><s%> to battle <S%H6635><s%>, expert <S%H6186><s%> in war <S%H4421><s%>, with all instruments <S%H3627><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>, fifty <S%H2572><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>, which could keep command <S%H5737><s%>: they were not of double <S%H3820><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%>.

And of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%> captains <S%H8269><s%>, and with them with shield <S%H6793><s%> and spear <S%H2595><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.
And of the Danites <S%H1839><s%> expert <S%H6186><s%> in war <S%H4421><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.
And of Asher <S%H836><s%>, such as went forth <S%H3318><s%> to battle <S%H6635><s%>, expert <S%H6186><s%> in war <S%H4421><s%>, forty <S%H705><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

And on the other side <S%H5676><s%> of Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, of the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%>, and the Gadites <S%H1425><s%>, and of the half <S%H2677><s%> tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, with all manner of instruments <S%H3627><s%> of war <S%H6635><s%> for the battle <S%H4421><s%>, an hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

All these men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>, that could keep <S%H5737><s%> command <S%H4634><s%>, came <S%H935><s%> with a perfect <S%H8003><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> to Hebron <S%H2275><s%>, to make David <S%H1732><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> over all Israel <S%H3478><s%>: and all the rest <S%H7611><s%> also of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were of one <S%H259><s%> heart <S%H3824><s%> to make David <S%H1732><s%> king <S%H4427><s%>.

And there they were with David <S%H1732><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, eating <S%H398><s%> and drinking <S%H8354><s%>: for their brothers <S%H251><s%> had prepared for them <S%H3559><s%>.

Moreover they that were near <S%H7138><s%> them <S%H3485><s%>, even unto Issachar and Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> and Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>, brought <S%H935><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> on donkeys <S%H2543><s%>, and on camels <S%H1581><s%>, and on mules <S%H6505><s%>, and on oxen <S%H1241><s%>, and food <S%H3978><s%>, meal <S%H7058><s%>, cakes <S%H1690><s%> of figs <S%H6778><s%>, and bunches of raisins, and wine <S%H3196><s%>, and oil <S%H8081><s%>, and oxen <S%H1241><s%>, and sheep <S%H6629><s%> abundantly <S%H7230><s%>: for there was joy <S%H8057><s%> in Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
